text:
Message 722 of 4024
Up another 100k in the last couple weeks. Overall assets are up significantly since I retired to focus on our investments. Let me know if you would
prefer to to go your own way as mentioned before. I can move some portion of this to cash, so we can note the sell date and count dollar for dollar
when September hits.
Sent:01/25/2024 at 07:17 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/25/2024 at 07:55 AM)
Subject:Fidelity
Attachments:IMG_1050.PNG (319 KB)
Message 723 of 4024
I understand you arranged for Elsa to bring packages mailed to Kirkland to your place today.
I have not touched any items since the last move. If you don’t want to arrange a pick up I will move them to either garage or storage. If you want
someone else to touch them and move let me know who and we can align if I agree they enter the residence.
Adrian will not join dinner tonight. We have not addressed his concerns. He also has tutoring which is on the calendar and I noticed you did not do
any soberlink tests yesterday and only one the day before.
I will reach out to Dr. Brown and can include you on the email. This was agreed to in your lawyer letter to my lawyer. If you are now disagreeing with
approach, I will let my lawyer know and respond in letter back to your lawyer to put in the record.
Sent:01/25/2024 at 07:55 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/25/2024 at 08:51 AM)
Subject:Re: Packages / Items
Message 724 of 4024
Can you advise when money will be moved to BofA to pay down credit cards below.
My Amex is now 13,228
Chase is 27,745
My Alaska is 2,560
I can’t see your Amex or pay that down.
For the Alaska card we can use the funds in unemployment account. Lmk if you want me to go in using your credentials or you do it. If we don’t then
it will need to be paid from BofA.
The chase card includes any Amazon spend from both of us. There are eBay purchases, linked in subscriptions, Lugg, onlyfans charges, which are
your spend.
Sent:01/25/2024 at 08:07 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/25/2024 at 08:53 AM)
Subject:Re: Credit Card
